description:
Through video training and hands-on exercises, sSerial entrepreneur Scott Fritz will teach you how to move from 80 hour a week business manager to a passive investor in your business. You'll learn more than 8 systems to help you develop the right mindset philosophy to finally achieve every entrepreneur's dream.

You will learn about:

  • the ownership paradox
  • tracking metrics
  • decision filter
  • weedeating
  • decision matrix
  • ownership and company value
  • standard operating procedures
  • and so much more!

Enroll in this course if you are ready to experience a better way to run your business.

This is a one day bootcamp to shift your business from relying on you, to relying on systems.

Take this course to change the way you manage your business.
title: 40 Hour Work Year - from Entrepreneur to Passive Investor
